        VIDEO PRODUCTION
          ASTUDIO is the premier choice for bespoke video production services for Luxury, Lifestyle, and Retail businesses. Our impressive client roster, including NEOM, Mandarin Oriental, and Piaget, testifies to our expertise in creating visually stunning content, adept storytelling, and creative ingenuity. Let us help you amplify your message and take your brand to the next level.

FROM PRE TO POST PRODUCTION
	
		
		
			
		
	

	
		
			As one of the top video production companies in the UAE, our well-defined video production process includes pre-production, production, and post-production phases. During pre-production, we work closely with our clients to understand their requirements, develop a creative concept, storyboard, and script, and finalize the logistics of the shoot. In the production phase, we use a range of techniques to capture high-quality footage, including cinematography, lighting, and sound design.
Finally, during the post-production phase, we take the raw footage and turn it into a polished and compelling video, using a range of tools and techniques to edit, enhance, and refine the footage. We take pride in delivering exceptional and customized video production services that elevate brands to new heights.

		
	

	
		
			
  We Put the Future in focus with film. We Put the Future in focus with film. We Put the Future in focus with film.

		
	
VIDEO PRODUCTION PROCESS
	
		
			1.
Pre-Production: This is the planning phase where we work closely with our clients to understand their requirements, goals, and vision for the video. During this phase, we collaborate with our clients to develop a creative concept, storyboard, and script. We finalize the location, casting, and equipment requirements, and plan for any necessary permits or permissions. This is also where we create a shooting schedule that takes into account all the logistical aspects of the shoot. By the end of the pre-production phase, we have a clear plan in place for the shoot, and everyone involved in the project knows what to expect.

		
	

	
		
			2.
Production: As a top advertising production agency, we understand that the production phase is critical to the success of a video project. This phase involves cinematography, lighting, sound design, and other elements necessary for filming. We work closely with our clients to ensure that everything is captured according to their vision and specifications. Our team uses high-quality equipment and the latest techniques to ensure that the footage we capture is of the highest quality. We also pay close attention to detail, making sure that everything is captured in the right way to effectively tell the story and deliver the intended message.

		
	

	
		
			3.
Post-Production: This is the phase where we take the raw footage and turn it into a polished and compelling video. During the post-production phase, we use a range of tools and techniques to edit, enhance, and refine the footage. This includes color grading, sound design, visual effects, and music composition. We work with our clients to incorporate their feedback and make any necessary revisions until the final video is ready for delivery. By the end of the post-production phase, we have a completed video that tells the story in a compelling way and meets our clients’ expectations.

		
	
get in touch
	
		
			
  



		
	

	
		
			Lights, camera, action! When it comes to creating captivating videos, we’re an advertising production agency that knows how to get it done. From concept to delivery, we handle every step of the process with precision and creativity.
Let us help you create a video that will leave a lasting impression on your audience.
Get in touch with us today to discuss your project!

		
	

	
		
			case studies
			
				
					
						
							L’AZURDE - Nuit Blanche
						
						Our brief was to create an aspirational film for L'azurde that highlights their breath-taking jewellery and celebrates the New Year. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman - A 360 Roadmap
						
						ASTUDIO designed a 360-degree digital strategy for Experience Oman to increase its presence online and meet goals. Find out more about our strategy here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							SÉLECT LABEL
						
						ASTUDIO combined SELECT LABEL's heritage with modern branding, crafting a captivating narrative showcasing luxury and innovation.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							STORE OF THE FUTURE
						
						ASTUDIO produced over 340 pieces of content to be showcased in Store of the Future when the store opened its doors in Mall of the Emirates. Find out more.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							MFDP LEGAL
						
						ASTUDIO redefined MFDP's brand, developing contemporary design based on insights about the legal industry.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Azza Fahmy Real Love
						
						Approaching their 50th anniversary, Azza Fahmy Jewellery wanted to create a standout social media campaign for Mother’s Day. View the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							ETHER BY CLOUD SPACES
						
						ASTUDIO's brief was to build an identity, positioning and strategy for the revolutionary retail experience, Ether by Cloud Spaces. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							ELIE SAAB TIMEPIECES
						
						ASTUDIO was asked to lead the creative and production of the launch campaign for ELIE SAAB Timepieces. Find out more about our marketing approach here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Vyntage Horology
						
						ASTUDIO crafted Vyntage's identity, where modern Emirati vision meets the meticulousness of Swiss watchmaking.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman Website Wonder
						
						Our aim was to design a mobile-friendly, accessible and beautiful website for Experience Oman. Have a look at our approach and the end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Sharjah Events - 2021 Calendar #SeeSharjah
						
						Sharjah Events launched their 2021 Calendar online to promote big events and activities for the year. Our job was to create an engaging digital strategy.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							MANDARIN ORIENTAL EMIRATES PALACE
						
						For the launch of the Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental in Abu Dhabi, we were tasked to create an exceptional film to showcase the hotel. See more here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Piaget Ramadan #TurnLifeOn
						
						Luxury Swiss watchmaker and jewellery brand, Piaget, wanted to mark Ramadan 2022 with a modern campaign for its Possession collection. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Vogue & WIRED X NEOM
						
						ASTUDIO was commissioned by Vogue Arabia and WIRED ME to document four Saudi women as they explore what NEOM has to offer. View the end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Wego - Holidays
						
						For Wego Arabia’s 2018 summer ad campaign, our brief was to convince consumers to book their holiday online with Wego. Have a look at the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman OmanByYou
						
						With the help of ASTUDIO, #OmanByYou was the first social media activation by a tourism board that only used UGC for marketing. Read the full brief here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							VOGUE ARABIA FINDING MĀ
						
						ASTUDIO produced a dynamic fashion film for Vogue Arabia where East meets West, which ended up being shortlisted by the London Fashion Film Festival.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							THAT CONCEPT STORE
						
						THAT Concept Store, a brand new retail experience inside Mall of the Emirates, was in need of a launch campaign to challenge the norm. Here's what we did.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							BVLGARI Jannah, a Five-Petal Story
						
						This campaign features the launch of BVLGARI’s exclusive Jannah jewellery collection, which premiered at Louvre Abu Dhabi. Have a look at the case study.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Mandarin Oriental Social Strategy
						
						The five-star Mandarin Oriental Jumeira in Dubai wanted to stand out from its competitors on social media. Find out exactly how ASTUDIO achieved this.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							RANA MIKDASHI
						
						We were tasked with creating a complete digital strategy for Rana Mikdashi, a handcrafted, sculptural jewellery brand. Have a look at our strategy here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Experience Oman - Love Summer Again
						
						ASTUDIO created a summer destination campaign for Experience Oman. Have a look at the full brief, our approach and the results in the case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							B FOR BEIRUT BVLGARI
						
						BVLGARI partnered with Save the Children and required a film to raise awareness and donations. Learn more about ASTUDIO's approach and end-result here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							Oman in Venice Art Biennale
						
						We were briefed to position Oman as a top travel destination and get travellers in Venice to visit the Oman Pavilion. Read the complete case study here.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							BVLGARI WONDERS OF LOVE
						
						"The Wonders of Love," showcases love as a universal concept flowing through Ramadan. Through our film campaign, we highlight the brand identity and V in BVLGARI, sharing the wonders of love with V stories that are localized for our Ramadan campaign.
					
					
						
							
							
						
					
				
			
		
			
				
					
						
							HADARA MAGAZINE
						
						For this project, we were tasked to create synergy across Hadara Magazine’s offline and online presence. Find out how we accomplished that.

Professional video production company in Dubai
From advertising and corporate video production to thumb-stopping social media video content. Creative video marketing runs in our blood. Let’s make magic.
At ASTUDIO, a multi award-winning video production agency in Dubai, we kick start the creative process by conceptualizing the best way to tell your story and captivate your audience. Our team strives to deliver an effective visual piece that embodies your brand’s authenticity, core values, vision, and brand identity – delivering production excellence with panache and a sense of wonder.
Our team of producers, directors, editors, videographers, location managers and casting directors, streamline the production process for video content, delivering world-class visual assets and creative content.
Production Management
As a leading production house in UAE and across the Middle East, we manage your entire project from start to finish. We break down each stage, guide and manage all elements including pre-production, production, and post-production to create a branded, visual aesthetic that stands out from your competitors and achieves your business goals.
Casting and Location Scouting
We’ll work together to develop storyboards, mood boards, comprehensive shot lists, and creative avenues that our creators will use to produce your ideal content. Once we have the objectives for visual assets, our team determines the ideal locations and quality talent to bring this shoot to life.
Robust Shooting Capability
We will stay on location during your shoot to make sure your project gets the personal attention it deserves. When it comes to the latest technology, our team of camera operators and videographers can’t be beaten. We make use of the newest industry-leading cameras, audio/video equipment, lighting, and other specialized tools to help make your brand aesthetic shine at its brightest.
Digital Editing and Retouching
We offer end-to-end video services – so when we have the visuals we need, we then work on editing the videos. This is where our design team and professional re-touchers become fully involved to put on the finishing touches on your projects to suit your final output.
Work with ASTUDIO as your Video Production Agency
With more than 15 years of experience, ASTUDIO is the video production company in Dubai, UAE and across the globe that make brand stories come to life! Trust our creative videography and video marketing skills to captivate your audience with cutting-edge visuals that will get your brand noticed. Contact us today and let’s start working on your next video project.
